onboarding.title: An app to manage your ticket
onboarding.label: Get Started

code.description: First, confirm your email by entering the 6-digit code we sent to your address:
code.codeError: The code you entered mismatch with the code we've sent to your email address.

password.description: Set up your password to improve the security of your account.
password.passwordError: Your password is not strong enough. It should contain min. 8 characters, 1 uppercase, 1 number & 1 special character !
password.hint: min. 8 characters, 1 uppercase, 1 number & 1 special character

information.description: Let us know who your are !
information.disclaimer: Your username can be seen by other user, your firstname and lastname will only be used to generate your ticket.

access.title: Permission required
access.body: You don't have the permission to perform this action.

badRefreshToken.title: Invalid JWT Token
badRefreshToken.body: The token sent to the server is invalid. Please restart the app and try again.

credential.title: Bad credential
credential.body: The given e-mail or password doesn't matcht our database information.

usernameAlreadyUsed.title: Username already used
usernameAlreadyUsed.body: Unfortunally, this username is already used by someone else.

emailAlreadyUsed.title: E-mail already used
emailAlreadyUsed.body: This e-mail already exist in our database, you can try to recover your password.

unknown.title: Unknow error
unknown.body: An unknown error occurred, please try again later or contact our support.
